member.name: M:iTelluro.DataTools.Utility.GIS.ShortestRoutePlanner.SetObstacles(iTelluro.DataTools.Utility.GIS.Point,System.Double)
member.summary: 设置事故点/障碍点，在该点影响范围内的道路都将视为不可通行。 设置多个点时，建议使用SetObstacles另一种形式
member.param:
事故点的影响范围，默认为0，指明该点完全在道路上。
因为给的坐标不一定完全在道路上，所以只要处于障碍点影响范围内的道路，都视为不可通行。
member.remarks: 可多次调用，障碍数据会累积，但必须在路线规划前调用。
member.returns: 返回这一次设置所影响到的道路编号

member.name: T:iTelluro.DataTools.Utility.Threads.Pool
member.summary:
提供一个线程池，该线程池可用于发送工作项
这个实现和ThreadPool的区别是允许创建多个有不同并发数的实例。 效率和ThreadPool相当，甚至略高。
member.remarks: 线程池在程序退出前必须显式调用Dispose方法.

member.name: M:iTelluro.DataTools.Utility.Threads.Pool.#ctor
member.summary: 默认构造，按cpu内核数创建线程数量

member.summary: 指定最多并发线程数量

member.summary: 指定最多并发线程数量
member.param: 线程池名，即主线程名称

member.name: M:iTelluro.DataTools.Utility.Threads.Pool.Dispose
member.remarks:
会丢弃未执行的任务,但不会停止正在执行的线程
如果想停止正在执行的线程，请使用StopAll()

member.summary: 停止正在执行的线程,清除还未执行的任务,销毁线程池

member.name: F:iTelluro.DataTools.Utility.Win32.FormatMessageFlags.FORMAT_MESSAGE_ALLOCATE_BUFFER
member.summary: The lpBuffer parameter is a pointer to a PVOID pointer, and that the nSize parameter specifies the minimum number of TCHARs to allocate for an output message buffer. The function allocates a buffer large enough to hold the formatted message, and places a pointer to the allocated buffer at the address specified by lpBuffer. The caller should use the LocalFree function to free the buffer when it is no longer needed.

member.name: F:iTelluro.DataTools.Utility.Win32.FormatMessageFlags.FORMAT_MESSAGE_ARGUMENT_ARRAY
member.summary: The Arguments parameter is not a va_list structure, but is a pointer to an array of values that represent the arguments.

member.name: F:iTelluro.DataTools.Utility.Win32.FormatMessageFlags.FORMAT_MESSAGE_FROM_HMODULE
member.summary: This flag cannot be used with 64-bit integer values. If you are using a 64-bit integer, you must use the va_list structure.

member.name: F:iTelluro.DataTools.Utility.Win32.FormatMessageFlags.FORMAT_MESSAGE_FROM_STRING
member.summary: The lpSource parameter is a module handle containing the message-table resource(s) to search. If this lpSource handle is NULL, the current process's application image file will be searched. This flag cannot be used with FORMAT_MESSAGE_FROM_STRING. If the module has no message table resource, the function fails with ERROR_RESOURCE_TYPE_NOT_FOUND.

member.name: F:iTelluro.DataTools.Utility.Win32.FormatMessageFlags.FORMAT_MESSAGE_FROM_SYSTEM
member.summary: The lpSource parameter is a pointer to a null-terminated string that contains a message definition. The message definition may contain insert sequences, just as the message text in a message table resource may. This flag cannot be used with FORMAT_MESSAGE_FROM_HMODULE or FORMAT_MESSAGE_FROM_SYSTEM.

member.name: F:iTelluro.DataTools.Utility.Win32.FormatMessageFlags.FORMAT_MESSAGE_IGNORE_INSERTS
member.summary: The function should search the system message-table resource(s) for the requested message. If this flag is specified with FORMAT_MESSAGE_FROM_HMODULE, the function searches the system message table if the message is not found in the module specified by lpSource. This flag cannot be used with FORMAT_MESSAGE_FROM_STRING. If this flag is specified, an application can pass the result of the GetLastError function to retrieve the message text for a system-defined error.

member.name: F:iTelluro.DataTools.Utility.Win32.FormatMessageFlags.FORMAT_MESSAGE_MAX_WIDTH_MASK
member.summary: The function ignores regular line breaks in the message definition text. The function stores hard-coded line breaks in the message definition text into the output buffer. The function generates no new line breaks.

member.name: F:iTelluro.DataTools.Utility.Win32.FilePointerMoveMethod.FILE_BEGIN

member.name: F:iTelluro.DataTools.Utility.Win32.FilePointerMoveMethod.FILE_END
